com.redhat.rhn.common.conf

Class ConfigDefaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.conf.ConfigDefaults

  • public class ConfigDefaults
extends java.lang.Object
    ConfigDefaults is the place to store application specific Config settings and convenience methods.

      Constructs JDBC connection string based on configuration, checks for some basic sanity.

      Returns the directory which hosts all the cobbler kickstart .cfg files..
      java.lang.String getKickstartMountPoint()
      Return the kickstart mount point directory Note the mount point is guaranteed to have a '/' at the end of the string so you can use it for appending sub directories.

      Returns the default kickstart package name

      get the text to print at the top of a kickstart template

      Returns the System Currency multiplier for bug fix errata

      Returns the System Currency multiplier for low security errata

      Returns the System Currency multiplier for moderate security errata

      Returns the URL for the search server, if not defined returns http://localhost:2828/RPC2

      Returns the URL for the tasko server, if not defined returns http://localhost:2829/RPC2

      Returns the base directory where the virt artifacts will be stored.

      is documentation available

      is the server configured to use oracle

      is the server configured to use oracle

      Return true if this is a Spacewalk instance.

      Return true if SSL is available for web traffic.

      Return true if you are to use/save repodata into the DB

      • getKickstartMountPoint

        public java.lang.String getKickstartMountPoint()
        Return the kickstart mount point directory Note the mount point is guaranteed to have a '/' at the end of the string so you can use it for appending sub directories.
        Returns:
        the ks mount point directory.

        Returns:
        String from our config

      • getPageSizes

        public java.lang.String getPageSizes()
        Returns all the available page sizes. Note this is only meant to check if the web.page_sizes config entry is set you might want to use PageSizeDecorator.getPageSizes instead.
        Returns:
        the comma separated list of page sizes or "".
        See Also:
        for more info.

      • getDefaultPageSize

        public java.lang.String getDefaultPageSize()
        Returns the default page size config entry. Note this is only meant to check if the web.default_page_size config entry is set you might want to use PageSizeDecorator.getDefaultPageSize instead.
        Returns:
        the default page size config entry or "".
        See Also:
        for more info.

      • getKickstartConfigDir

        public java.lang.String getKickstartConfigDir()
        Returns the directory which hosts all the cobbler kickstart .cfg files.. All the .cfg files that have been generated by spacewalk will be either at ${kickstart.cobbler.dir}/wizard or ${kickstart.cobbler.dir}/upload
        Returns:
        the dir which has the kickstarts

      • getCobblerSnippetsDir

        public java.lang.String getCobblerSnippetsDir()
        Returns the directory which hosts all the org specific cobbler snippets files.. All the snippet files that have been generated by spacewalk will be at /var/lib/cobbler/snippets
        Returns:
        the dir which has the kickstarts cobbler snippets

      • getVirtPath

        public java.io.File getVirtPath(boolean xen)
        Returns the base directory where the virt artifacts will be stored. This information is used while setting up system records and so on..
        Parameters:
        xen - true if the virt path required is for a xen virt type.
        Returns:
        the virt path..
